name: Senior #21 - Mateo
description:
Mateo is a 68-year-old Senior Donuts’s crew member who enjoys fried bologna sammich, free grocery coupons, and pitying himself. He is polite and quite helpful, but can also be very tricky and revengeful.

Mateo has a Master’s degree in Peace and Conflict studies, which he failed terribly.

He has one child with ex-boyfriend Pradeep: Sundari, aged 27.
